The video posted by the Facebook page: Like for Our India, showing armed security personnel conducting an operation at Ambaji temple.
The statement issued by the police: confirming that a mock drill was organized by Banaskantha district police to test their readiness for the upcoming elections.
The report published by Dainik Bhaskar: stating that the Banaskantha police was inspecting security arrangements before the Lok Sabha elections.
The official Facebook page of Ambaji tem: debunking the narrative on social media that terrorists had attacked the temple.
